widgets.title: {{NETWORK_NAME}} Discovery Credential Management
widgets.extra_filter: (type in ['snmp-cred','ssh-cred','device-snmp-v1v2','device-snmp-v3','device-host-ssh'] and customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' and name contains '{{NETWORK_NAME}}') or (type in ['snmp-cred','ssh-cred','device-snmp-v1v2','device-snmp-v3','device-host-ssh'] and customerTag is empty and name contains '{{NETWORK_NAME}}')
widgets.extra_filter1: type in ['snmp-cred','ssh-cred'] and (customerTag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customerTag is empty)

widgets.title: {{NETWORK_NAME}} Discovery
widgets.extra_filter: (customer_tag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' and network_name is '{{NETWORK_NAME}}') or (customer_tag is empty  and network_name is '{{NETWORK_NAME}}')

formFieldList.label: Add it to discovery?
formFieldList.help: Should this network device be part of discovery?
CSV file format.The file should contain device_ip,  discovery_scope columns.
formFieldList.label: NOTE: Required headers in CSV file: device_ip, discovery_scope
Discovery Scope
formFieldList.help: Should this be part of device?
Readonly field. Name of device to be deleted.
formFieldList.label: Device Name

widgets.title: {{NETWORK_NAME}} Discovery Runs
widgets.extra_filter0: customer_tag contains '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customer_tag is empty
widgets.extra_filter: (jobname contains '{{CUST_TAG}}' or jobname contains 'job') and type_ is 'overall_status' and total is not empty and pending is 0 and jobname contains '{{NETWORK_NAME}}'

formFieldList.help: Make sure access Verification is run for the devices you want to run discovery on
formFieldList.label: NOTE: Make sure that access verification is completed for  devices for which discovery needs to be run.

formFieldList.help: Select network devices for which you want to run discovery
formFieldList.label: Network Devices

widget.title: Device Details
widget.extra_filter: (customer_tag is '{{CUST_TAG}}' or customer_tag is empty) and network_name contains '{{NETWORK_NAME}}'

formFieldList.help: Make sure Discovery is run for the devices you want to run Topology on
formFieldList.label: NOTE: Make sure that Run Discovery is completed for  devices for which Topology needs to be run.
